title: Consultant Needed: Streamline B2B E-Commerce and Inventory Automation
description:
Project Description: We are a small yet focused merchandise and branded apparel business with a dedicated team of five, processing approximately five to ten orders daily. Our operations support a variety of clients, and we are seeking an experienced consultant to help streamline and automate key processes. Currently, our workflows involve manual steps for inventory tracking, order releases, and invoicing. Weâ€™re eager to explore cost-effective, technology-driven solutions tailored to our needs and scale.
While integration with a large clientâ€™s ERP system (via cXML PunchOut) is a potential future consideration, our immediate priority is automating internal workflows and improving our inventory and order management processes. If applicable, we are open to exploring integration solutions aligned with PunchOut protocols and PromoStandards. More information about PromoStandards can be found at PromoStandards.org.
Key Project Goals: Analyze current workflows, particularly around inventory tracking and order releases.
Recommend and assist in implementing software solutions for B2B e-commerce and inventory management.
Automate processes such as work order creation, inventory adjustments, and invoicing.
Explore and recommend integration solutions like PunchOut protocols and PromoStandards, if applicable.
Example Challenge: One specific process we aim to improve is our apparel release workflow, which is just one example of the broader services we provide to clients. Currently, we bulk produce items efficiently; however, inventory is manually entered into QuickBooks Desktop. When clients request a release, we manually create a "work order" in QuickBooks Desktop to fulfill the shipment, which also adjusts inventory. Shipping costs are then invoiced quarterly, as the products are prepaid on net terms. While this process works, it is time-consuming and labor-intensive. We are looking for modern, technology-driven solutions to streamline these steps and enhance efficiency.
Ideal Candidate: Strong expertise in B2B e-commerce platforms and inventory management systems.
Experience with automation tools and API integrations to improve workflows.  Knowledge of solutions tailored to merchandise or apparel businesses.
Familiarity with tools like ShipStation, PunchOut capabilities, PromoStandards, and ERP systems (preferred but not mandatory).
Deliverables: A detailed analysis of current processes with actionable recommendations for improvement.
Assistance in selecting and implementing software or tools for B2B inventory and order management.
Redesigned workflows to automate and optimize operations.
Support for transitioning to new tools or technologies with minimal disruption.
Budget: Open to proposals based on the complexity and scope of the project.
How to Apply: Please include the following in your proposal:
A summary of your experience with similar projects.
Examples of tools or technologies youâ€™ve implemented for B2B e-commerce or inventory management.
Any experience with PunchOut, PromoStandards, or ERP integrations (if applicable).
An estimated timeline and cost for completion.
Skills Required
eCommerce
Inventory Management
Workflow Consulting
ERP Software
Business Consulting
ai_reasoning: This post clearly represents a request for a consultant to help streamline and automate the client's e-commerce and inventory management processes, which is directly relevant to the agency's web design, graphic design, and Photoshop services. title: E-commerce Website Content Administrator
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This is an on-site position in Southern California ONLY. Absolutely no remote applicants, agencies, companies or freelancers please!
Agena Astro is looking for a full-time (min 30 hrs) product data/content management associate to maintain our Magento website and eBay/Amazon accounts from our office location in Cerritos, CA.
The ideal candidate should have at least 1 year of experience maintaining the product database of Magento, Shopify or similar e-commerce sites. This includes:
* Managing simple/bundle/configurable products (including descriptions, pricing, product images/videos, manuals, related products, etc.)
* Managing product categories, basic SEO, blog articles, etc.
The preferred candidate will have the following skills/attributes:
* Good understanding of HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Pagebuilder/Wordpress for website content management
* Superb attention to detail and accuracy, and a desire to produce very high quality work
* Very good MS Excel skills, including importing/exporting/conversion between various file types and data cleanup/management
* Very good Photoshop knowledge to edit product photos (crop, square, adjust, annotate, etc.)
* Team player who will be comfortable working with a small team daily and on multiple projects simultaneously with often-changing priorities
* Self-motivated and ready to take on key responsibilities with minimal supervision once trained
To Apply:
* Please send a resume and brief cover letter detailing your interest and qualifications for this job
* Be sure to list the hourly or annual salary that you seek. A range is OK for now.
About Agena Astro:
Agena Astro was founded in 2003 and now offers over 6,000 unique products from the worldâ€™s leading astronomy brands. With our customer-first approach and expert support team, we have gained a reputation for being the highest-rated astronomy shop in North America. We offer medical insurance, paid time off, annual bonus, and a pleasant/collaborative work environment.
Thank you for your interest!
ai_reasoning: This post appears to be a genuine request for a full-time content administrator to manage the e-commerce website and online marketplaces of Agena Astro, an astronomy products company. The role involves tasks directly relevant to the agency's web design, graphic design, and Photoshop services, such as managing product data, content, images, and website maintenance. The post provides clear details on the required skills and responsibilities, suggesting a well-defined need. Overall, this seems like a promising potential client for the agency's services.

title: Wordpress Developer
description:
Job Overview
We are seeking a skilled and motivated WordPress Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, particularly with WordPress, and will be responsible for creating and maintaining high-quality websites. This role requires a blend of technical expertise and creativity to deliver user-friendly and visually appealing web solutions.
Responsibilities
Develop, customize, and maintain WordPress websites to meet client specifications.
Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX best practices for optimal user experience.
Write clean, efficient code using JavaScript, TypeScript, and PHP.
Manage database interactions using MySQL for dynamic content delivery.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to website performance and functionality.
Stay updated on the latest web development trends and technologies.
Experience
Proven experience in WordPress development with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, MySQL, and SOAP for application development.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team environment.
Join us in creating innovative web solutions that enhance user engagement and drive business success!
Job Type: Full-time
Benefits:
401(k)
Health insurance
Paid time off
Compensation Package:
Bonus opportunities
Work Location: In person

title: looking for an editor
description: My name is Roxas Bhroanain, I am looking for a work for hire editor,  this person will need to submit a portfolio detailing many different aspects of photography from weddings down to long exposures. I need to know what im hiring. I am not looking for one time project or per time project this is an opportunity for a company approved on call editor that is not an employee but a contractor under my company. direct competition will not be accepted you will be my companies contractor and do nothing but work closely with me.
